attributes.action: Increase the funding for Youth clubs around the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
new reports have shown that half of the country's youth clubs are surviving hand to mouth as they attempt to provide services to young people with the funding of less then £10,000 a year.

and we the public wonder why there is such a major problem with youth crime? its because there is very little in the means of services such as youth clubs for them to go to.
